Job Title: Inside Sales Manager and Field Marketing (North Carolina)

Location: North Carolina, United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Sales

Description:
MiRXES is a Singapore-headquartered molecular diagnostic company with R&D, manufacturing, and clinical lab operations in Singapore, USA, Japan, and China. We specialize in microRNA technologies and the development, manufacturing, and provision of diagnostic test kits and clinical services. Our mission is to enable early disease detection and provide insights for better patient care by harnessing the power of microRNA to augment traditional testing. Our vision is to be the worldâ€™s leading developer and provider of accurate, actionable, and affordable microRNA-powered diagnostic tests.
Job Location: Raleigh/Durham, North Carolina, USA

Job Summary:Mirxes Corporation, the US subsidiary of Mirxes Pte., is looking for an experienced inside sales and marketing professional to drive lead generation and sales of our suite of genomics research services within the US and Canada. Lead generation will be achieved through identification of customer targets within the academic, government and biopharma research space, generation of engaging outreach campaigns and customer follow up. The role will also drive regional marketing content creation and support social media and website marketing efforts. Additional responsibilities will include support functions for commercial operations such as regional lead funnel management, quote generation and receiving & shipping of customer samples.

Roles and Responsibilities:Inside Sales Assist field sales by identifying target customers, generating outreach campaigns, creating sales tools, and accelerating sales through consistent lead generationAccount mapping across targeted industriesFollow up to advance leads through the sales funnelScheduling of meetings with customer prospectsAssisting field business development representatives with closing of sales
Commercial Operations SupportManagement of the regional sales lead funnelQuote generation for customersCustomer sample receiving and shipping to our genomics services lab in Singapore from our US lab offices in Durham, North Carolina
Field MarketingCoordinate the planning and execution of all US marketing activities, programs and campaigns, both online and offline, including conferences, seminars, user meetings, webinars, online and offline advertising, digital marketing, content marketing, and promotions

Desired Skills and Competencies:Preferred Educational BackgroundUniversity/College Degree or equivalent in a scientific discipline (molecular biology, genetics or biochemistry preferred) Advanced degree in marketing, business, or related discipline is strongly desired
Preferred Experiential Background3+ years of inside sales, marketing, or related experienceCRM database knowledge (Hubspot, Zoho)Genomics industry experience preferredExperience and understanding of leading next generation sequencing based genomics methods, such as WGS/WES, RNA-seq, and spatial biology Excellent communication (verbal and written), presentation skillsNegotiation skills and ability to persuadeAbility to travel 
We appreciate your interest in the above-mentioned position, however, due to overwhelming response, only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
